passwordWrong: We couldn't find an account with these credentials.
changePasswordDescription2: No one should know your password (well, except you, of course).
changePasswordHint: After saving, you will be signed out and will have to sign in with your new password.
languageDescription: The language you see this website in.
languageHint: You can choose one of the translated languages.
translationHelp: If you want to help translating the site into a different language, feel free to reach out to us via
deleteDescription: This will delete your Account and all the Persons linked to that Account. You won't be able to sign in to the Account again after this.
deleteHint: Enter the Account's Email Address to continue
deleteWarning: !!! This cannot be undone - everything will be gone !!!
emailDescription: Your Email address. This Email is unique to your Account. You use it to sign in to this Account.
emailChangeDescription: After saving, you will be signed out and will have to sign in with the new Email address.
emailMustEqual: Email must be your Account's email
emailUnique: Sorry, this email already exists. Please choose another one.

signUp.passwordHint: Please choose a password for your Account
signUp.passwordConfirmHint: Just to be sure, please confirm your password one more time
signUp.description1: You want to create an Account?
signUp.hint1: You'll be asked to enter your email address and choose a password.
signUp.hint2: We'll then send you a verification email to activate your Account.
signUp.signInHint: If you already have an Account, you can sign in instead.
signUp.passwordRuleHint: Has to have at least 8 characters
signUp.passwordDescription: Please choose a password for your account
signUp.passwordRepeatDescription: Just to be sure, please confirm your password one more time
signUp.successDescription1: We sent you an email with a verfication link.
signUp.successDescription2: Use that link to activate your Account.
signUp.successDescription3: Please also check your spam folder if you can't find it.
